TopicTitle: Is there any good mods that make ksp beautiful

Articles.Content: Hey guys, I'm looking to find mods that make ksp look good but i want mods that blend in with each other. I've tried realism overhaul with eve, scatter, and etc. which made the game look good but it wasn't to my liking. If you know any "mod packs" that make the game look stellar, i would like to know. Thx.

Spectra was overall good mod for graphics, since ksp 1.9 has really good ground textures, spectra should make it even better looking game. Make sure you have scatterer with it since it's the biggest game changer, i sometimes run ksp with scatterer only and it single handedly looks amazing;

Then there's textures unlimited mod for metallic and shiny textures but i dont think it's not mature enough to install.
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.

4 hours ago, WumboJumbo said:

Hey guys, I'm looking to find mods that make ksp look good but i want mods that blend in with each other. I've tried realism overhaul with eve, scatter, and etc. which made the game look good but it wasn't to my liking. If you know any "mod packs" that make the game look stellar, i would like to know. Thx.

First things first, what exactly do you want? Here's what I found to be the best:

Para-Sci pack for high performance, and it looks nice too.

 

SVE, which is my personal favorite, because it has pretty good performance, while looking better than Para-Sci. It's pretty much the same performance as Spectra, as the previous poster mentioned.

 

And then there's Astronomer's visual pack, which is basically the Holy Grail of visuals, but it kills my Macbook Pro, so I wouldn't try it if you're playing on a bad computer.

 

Also, there's KS3P, which has some nice effects, and you can find custom configs provided by some of the other forum users, but it's really just special effects, so beware. No clouds and such.

 

As far as I know, there's no mod visual packs that I know of.

Spoiler

Also, you shouldn't start with realism overhaul. Just my two cents.

 

Edited May 19, 2020 by Misguided_Kerbal
